Package omp2gpu.transforms

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConvertStatic2Global
    Convert static variables in procedures except for main into global variables.
    CudaAnnotationParser
    This pass is used to parse cuda annotations that might be added in the C source code input to Cetus and convert them to internal CudaAnnotations.
    CudaNormalizeReturn
    This normalization pass is intended to simplify return statements for the Procedures in the program.
    KernelCallingProcCloning
    KernelCallingProcCloning clones procedures that are called in kernel regions.
    LoopCollapse
    This class is a helper class, which is called in O2GTranslator
    O2GTranslator
    OpenMP-to-GPGPU Translator, which performs OpenMP to CUDA-GPGPU translation.
    OmpCollapse
    OmpCollapse performs source-level transformation to collapse the iterations of all associated loops into one larger iteration space.
    ParallelLoopSwap
    ParallelLoopSwap is a transformation, which is a reverse operation of LoopInterchange.
    SplitOmpPRegion
    SplitOmpPRegion splits OpenMP parallel regions at each explicit/implicit synchronization point.
    TransformTools
    TransformTools provides tools for various transformation tools for OpenMP-to-CUDA translation.
    UEPRemoval
    UEPRemoval solves upwardly-exposed private variable problems.
